components.name: utils
components.description: Utility functions used by shadcn/ui components

components.name: button
components.description: Displays a button or a component that looks like a button

components.name: label
components.description: Renders an accessible label associated with controls

components.name: select
components.description: Displays a list of options for the user to pick from

components.name: checkbox
components.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked

components.name: card
components.description: Displays a card with header, content, and footer

components.name: advanced-search
components.description: Advanced search component with multiple field types support

components.name: data-table
components.description: Feature-rich data table with sorting, pagination, and row selection

components.name: form-wizard
components.description: Multi-step form wizard with step validation and navigation
